title: Valuable Dock Worker
description: We have a moderately positive but still developing professional relationship, with StormRider serving as an employee at my Public Dock at Riva dei Guaritori. Both of us are currently experiencing hunger issues which may be affecting our work productivity, suggesting I should consider addressing our mutual basic needs to improve our professional connection.
